title: List of all Android custom font  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android custom font  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: FontometricsLibrary
repoList.description: Android Library to use custom fonts with ease.

repoList.name: EasyFonts
repoList.description: Useful library to use custom fonts in your android app

repoList.name: CustomFontLib
repoList.description: Android Library to help adding custom fonts to Android Views.

repoList.name: Fontinator
repoList.description: Fontinator is an Android-Library make it easy, to use custom Fonts.

repoList.name: SmartFonts
repoList.description: Smart Fonts for Android is a Library which makes it easy to use Custom Fonts in Apps

repoList.name: FontTextView
repoList.description: This library include some custom views and a util class help you replace android default font in different ways.(keyword:Font TextView, Custom TextView)

repoList.name: font-compat
repoList.description: An easy to use library for using custom font families in your Android applications.

repoList.name: AppFontChanger
repoList.description: Custom font library for android | Library to change/add font of Entire Android Application at once without wasting your time - TextViews, EditText, Buttons, Views etc.,

repoList.name: TypefaceLibrary
repoList.description: Sample showing how to create a custom fonts library for Android

repoList.name: Calligrapher
repoList.description: A helper library to set custom fonts to your android view
